```{r, echo=FALSE, include=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(broom)
library(skimr)

```


# Results 

```{r, echo=FALSE}

scores <- c(39,35.5,47.5,42,36,38.5,40,46,46.5,46.5,40,32,29.5,40,46,44,47,46.5,39)
percentages <- tibble(score = scores/50*100) 
percentages_5 <- tibble(score = scores/45*100)

percentages |> 
    summary() |> 
    kable("latex",
          booktabs = TRUE,
#          col.names = NULL, 
          caption = "Midterm 1 - raw scores") %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped",
                                  font_size = 12,
                                  "H"#,"scale_down"
                                  )) 

percentages_5 |> 
    summary() |> 
    kable("latex",
          booktabs = TRUE,
#          col.names = NULL, 
          caption = "Midterm 1 - adjusted scores") %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped",
                                  font_size = 12,
                                  "H"#,"scale_down"
                                  ))
    

    

```
# Dataviz

```{r}
percentages |> 
    ggplot(aes(x = score)) +
    geom_histogram(bins = 10)
```
